4.Pros: I love meeting new people. At McDonald's you meet new people every day. The customer that return become a part of the McDonald's family. I serve the very young, the young adult, families, the mature, to the precious elders. I see people who set up their computer and get some word down while enjoying a meal or interact with the social media. I see families come in to share a meal together after running errands or on their way to some place. We even have young adults come in to play card games while enjoying a snack. It is amazing being a brief part of their lives and they a brief part of our lives. I have met some amazing people as team mates as well. Those who work together to not just accomplish a job but to push themselves to excel towards excellence.
4.Cons: Customer Service is the building block of any business. McDonald's had the opportunity to train so many young people who are stepping into the job market for the first time. I do not feel McDonald's is successful in this area. They have an opportunity to build team work and I do not feel they are successful here either.

5.Cons: bad management and sexual harassment from management
